data.name: Love Make Power 做愛發電公司
data.detailed_description:
◆Story

Thanks to scientific research, people can make love and make electron power. Making love as a work, just fuck the girl and earn money! By the way, it is a love cultivation game.

◆Gameplay

Players need to make love with the two characters to earn money, choose each one or both to make electron power!

◆Game Features

Three different endings
Love cultivation game
Love Make Power!Thesis research by the author
Story about beauty full of drama and sex
Up to 100,000 words of scenario text

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains partial nudity, consensual and non-consensual sex, idol sex with fans.
All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.
